The mirror back is like the realization of self-realization.
The face depends on the back.
His back is supported by his face.
They therefore attain mutual realization.
It's also possible to realize it for yourself with copper.
The mirror relies on copper.
The copper relies on the mirror.
Record of the Axiom Mirror, Volume 60

source_sentence: 戊申歲分司大藏都監開板
translation: On the opening board of the Tripiṭaka Master Daizang, director of the yearly division of Wushan
